body:
> some of the comments from my previous review were not addressed (one about verbose comments and another about storing the set itself).

I apologize, I thought all feedback had been taken care of a while ago. I'll go back through and address any that I've missed.

> Also, the new commit added after @rehandalal 's review

This is my fault - I had corrected Rehan's review fix and then amended the `Code review` commit to try and keep the commit count low. I didn't realize it'd make it look like everything was added after the review, but it makes sense - sorry for the confusion.
body_text:
some of the comments from my previous review were not addressed (one about verbose comments and another about storing the set itself).

I apologize, I thought all feedback had been taken care of a while ago. I'll go back through and address any that I've missed.

Also, the new commit added after @rehandalal 's review

This is my fault - I had corrected Rehan's review fix and then amended the Code review commit to try and keep the commit count low. I didn't realize it'd make it look like everything was added after the review, but it makes sense - sorry for the confusion.
body_html:
some of the comments from my previous review were not addressed (one about verbose comments and another about storing the set itself).

I apologize, I thought all feedback had been taken care of a while ago. I'll go back through and address any that I've missed.

Also, the new commit added after @rehandalal 's review

This is my fault - I had corrected Rehan's review fix and then amended the Code review commit to try and keep the commit count low. I didn't realize it'd make it look like everything was added after the review, but it makes sense - sorry for the confusion.
